title: Awesome List Updates on Jun 13, 2025
_seo_title: Awesome List Updates on Jun 13, 2025 - Track Awesome List

items.title: Awesome Selfhosted
items.content_text:
### Software / Communication - Email - Complete Solutions

*   [b1gMail](https://www.b1gmail.eu) - Complete email solution that runs on any webspace with PHP and MariaDB. It supports POP3 catchall mailboxes and can also integrate with Postfix or b1gMailServer if you're running your own server. ([Source Code](https://codeberg.org/b1gMail/b1gMail), [Clients](https://www.b1gmail.eu/en/start/addon-b1gmailserver/)) `GPL-2.0` `PHP`

### Software / Generative Artificial Intelligence (GenAI)

*   [AnythingLLM](https://anythingllm.com/) - All-in-one desktop & Docker AI application with built-in RAG, AI agents, No-code agent builder, MCP compatibility, and more. ([Source Code (‚≠ê46k)](https://github.com/Mintplex-Labs/anything-llm)) `MIT` `Nodejs/Docker`
*   [Khoj](https://khoj.dev/) - Your AI second brain. Get answers from the web or your docs. Build custom agents, schedule automations, do deep research. Turn any online or local LLM into your personal, autonomous AI. ([Demo](https://app.khoj.dev/), [Source Code (‚≠ê31k)](https://github.com/khoj-ai/khoj)) `AGPL-3.0` `Python/Docker`

### Software / Knowledge Management Tools

*   [AFFiNE Community Edition](https://affine.pro/) - Next-gen knowledge base that brings planning, sorting and creating all together. Privacy first, customizable and ready to use (alternative to Notion and Miro). ([Demo](https://app.affine.pro/), [Source Code (‚≠ê53k)](https://github.com/toeverything/AFFiNE)) `MIT/AGPL-3.0` `Docker`

### Software / Pastebins

*   [Chiyogami (‚≠ê50)](https://github.com/rhee876527/chiyogami) - Pastebin with API, client-side encryption, user accounts, syntax highlighting, markdown rendering, and more. `BSD-3-Clause` `Docker`

### Software / Proxy

*   [g3proxy](https://g3-project.readthedocs.io/projects/g3proxy/en/latest/) - Forward proxy server supporting proxy chaining, protocol inspection, MITM Interception, ICAP adaptation and transparent proxy. ([Source Code (‚≠ê682)](https://github.com/bytedance/g3/tree/master/g3proxy)) `Apache-2.0` `Rust/deb`
items.content_html:
Software / Communication - Email - Complete Solutions

  • b1gMail - Complete email solution that runs on any webspace with PHP and MariaDB. It supports POP3 catchall mailboxes and can also integrate with Postfix or b1gMailServer if you're running your own server. (Source Code, Clients) GPL-2.0 PHP

Software / Generative Artificial Intelligence (GenAI)

  • AnythingLLM - All-in-one desktop & Docker AI application with built-in RAG, AI agents, No-code agent builder, MCP compatibility, and more. (Source Code (‚≠ê46k)) MIT Nodejs/Docker
  • Khoj - Your AI second brain. Get answers from the web or your docs. Build custom agents, schedule automations, do deep research. Turn any online or local LLM into your personal, autonomous AI. (Demo, Source Code (‚≠ê31k)) AGPL-3.0 Python/Docker

Software / Knowledge Management Tools

  • AFFiNE Community Edition - Next-gen knowledge base that brings planning, sorting and creating all together. Privacy first, customizable and ready to use (alternative to Notion and Miro). (Demo, Source Code (‚≠ê53k)) MIT/AGPL-3.0 Docker

Software / Pastebins

  • Chiyogami (‚≠ê50) - Pastebin with API, client-side encryption, user accounts, syntax highlighting, markdown rendering, and more. BSD-3-Clause Docker

Software / Proxy

items.title: Awesome for Beginners
items.content_text:
### JavaScript * [material-ui (‚≠ê96k)](https://github.com/mui/material-ui) *(label: good first issue)*
React components for faster and easier web development. Build your own design system, or start with Material Design. * [Next.js (‚≠ê133k)](https://github.com/vercel/next.js) *(label: good first issue)*
A minimalistic framework for universal server-rendered React applications * [reactjs.org (‚≠ê11k)](https://github.com/reactjs/react.dev) *(label: good first issue)*
The documentation website for reactjs * [Vue Router (‚≠ê4.3k)](https://github.com/vuejs/router) *(label: good first issue)*
The official router for Vue.js. ### PHP * [CodeIgniter (‚≠ê5.6k)](https://github.com/codeigniter4/CodeIgniter4) *(label: good first issue)*
A lightweight, fast PHP framework, it is easy to install and perfect for learning MVC architecture.
items.content_html:
JavaScript

  • material-ui (‚≠ê96k) (label: good first issue)
    React components for faster and easier web development. Build your own design system, or start with Material Design.
  • Next.js (‚≠ê133k) (label: good first issue)
    A minimalistic framework for universal server-rendered React applications
  • reactjs.org (‚≠ê11k) (label: good first issue)
    The documentation website for reactjs
  • Vue Router (‚≠ê4.3k) (label: good first issue)
    The official router for Vue.js.

PHP

  • CodeIgniter (‚≠ê5.6k) (label: good first issue)
    A lightweight, fast PHP framework, it is easy to install and perfect for learning MVC architecture.

items.title: Awesome Transit
items.content_text:
### Transit Map Creation / Rust

*   [loom (‚≠ê197)](https://github.com/ad-freiburg/loom) - Software suite for the automated generation of geographically correct or schematic transit maps.
items.content_html:
Transit Map Creation / Rust

  • loom (‚≠ê197) - Software suite for the automated generation of geographically correct or schematic transit maps.

items.title: Awesome Angular
items.content_text:
### Internationalization / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies)

*   [ngx-signal-i18n (‚≠ê1)](https://github.com/yagcioe/ngx-signal-i18n) - This package provides a typesafe and lazy-loaded internationalization (i18n) solution for Angular applications, built on top of signals for improved reactivity. It is compatible with zoneless Angular.
*   [@OGS-GmbH/ngx-translate (‚≠ê1)](https://github.com/OGS-GmbH/ngx-translate) - A lightweight, REST-based Angular i18n library designed for seamless internationalization with minimal setup. It supports dynamic language switching & flexible translation management via RESTful APIs.

### Free / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies)

*   [ngx-app-starter-kit (‚≠ê1)](https://github.com/r3zafa/ngx-app-starter-kit) - A modern Angular 18+ starter kit with Docker, devcontainer, and Angular Material integration for rapid, scalable web app development.

### Mixed utilities / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies)

*   [@studiohyperdrive/ngx-tools (‚≠ê12)](https://github.com/studiohyperdrive/hyperdrive-opensource) - A mono-repo providing several of the Angular based packages created and maintained by the [Studio Hyperdrive](https://studiohyperdrive.be/) team.
*   [@everllence/ngx-tools (‚≠ê2)](https://github.com/everllence/ngx-tools) - This repository contains a collection of libraries is designed to elevate your Angular development experience.
items.content_html:
Internationalization / Google Developer Experts

  • ngx-signal-i18n (‚≠ê1) - This package provides a typesafe and lazy-loaded internationalization (i18n) solution for Angular applications, built on top of signals for improved reactivity. It is compatible with zoneless Angular.
  • @OGS-GmbH/ngx-translate (‚≠ê1) - A lightweight, REST-based Angular i18n library designed for seamless internationalization with minimal setup. It supports dynamic language switching & flexible translation management via RESTful APIs.

Free / Google Developer Experts

  • ngx-app-starter-kit (‚≠ê1) - A modern Angular 18+ starter kit with Docker, devcontainer, and Angular Material integration for rapid, scalable web app development.

Mixed utilities / Google Developer Experts

  • @studiohyperdrive/ngx-tools (‚≠ê12) - A mono-repo providing several of the Angular based packages created and maintained by the Studio Hyperdrive team.
  • @everllence/ngx-tools (‚≠ê2) - This repository contains a collection of libraries is designed to elevate your Angular development experience.

items.title: Awesome Osint
items.content_text:
### Social Media Tools / Instagram

*   [Osintgram (‚≠ê11k)](https://github.com/Datalux/Osintgram) - Osintgram offers an interactive shell to perform analysis on Instagram account of any users by its nickname.
*   [Osintgraph (‚≠ê170)](https://github.com/XD-MHLOO/Osintgraph) - Tool that maps your target‚Äôs Instagram data and relationships in Neo4j for social network analysis.
items.content_html:
Social Media Tools / Instagram

  • Osintgram (‚≠ê11k) - Osintgram offers an interactive shell to perform analysis on Instagram account of any users by its nickname.
  • Osintgraph (‚≠ê170) - Tool that maps your target‚Äôs Instagram data and relationships in Neo4j for social network analysis.

items.title: Free for Dev
items.content_text:
### APIs, Data, and ML

*   [Maxim AI](https://getmaxim.ai/) - Simulate, evaluate, and observe your AI agents. Maxim is an end-to-end evaluation and observability platform, helping teams ship their AI agents reliably and >5x faster. Free forever for indie developers and small teams (3 seats).
items.content_html:
APIs, Data, and ML

  • Maxim AI - Simulate, evaluate, and observe your AI agents. Maxim is an end-to-end evaluation and observability platform, helping teams ship their AI agents reliably and >5x faster. Free forever for indie developers and small teams (3 seats).

items.title: Android Security Awesome
items.content_text:
### Tools / Static Analysis Tools

*   [CFGScanDroid (‚≠ê59)](https://github.com/douggard/CFGScanDroid) - Scans and compares the CFG against the CFG of malicious applications

### Tools / Dynamic Analysis Tools

*   [AuditdAndroid (‚≠ê45)](https://github.com/nwhusted/AuditdAndroid) ‚Äì Android port of auditd, not under active development anymore
*   ~~[Android Reverse Engineering](https://redmine.honeynet.org/projects/are/wiki) ‚Äì ARE (android reverse engineering) is not under active development anymore~~

### Tools / Reverse Engineering

*   [Frida](https://www.frida.re/) - inject JavaScript to explore applications and a [GUI tool (‚≠ê180)](https://github.com/antojoseph/diff-gui) for it

### Tools / Market Crawlers

*   [APK Downloader](https://apkcombo.com/apk-downloader/) Online Service to download APK from the Play Store for a specific Android Device Configuration

### Tools / Misc Tools

*   [Internal Blue (‚≠ê738)](https://github.com/seemoo-lab/internalblue) - Bluetooth experimentation framework based on the Reverse Engineering of Broadcom Bluetooth Controllers
*   [ARMv7 payload that provides arbitrary code execution on MediaTek bootloaders (‚≠ê88)](https://github.com/R0rt1z2/kaeru)
items.content_html:
Tools / Static Analysis Tools

  • CFGScanDroid (‚≠ê59) - Scans and compares the CFG against the CFG of malicious applications

Tools / Dynamic Analysis Tools

  • AuditdAndroid (‚≠ê45) ‚Äì Android port of auditd, not under active development anymore
  • Android Reverse Engineering ‚Äì ARE (android reverse engineering) is not under active development anymore

Tools / Reverse Engineering

  • Frida - inject JavaScript to explore applications and a GUI tool (‚≠ê180) for it

Tools / Market Crawlers

  • APK Downloader Online Service to download APK from the Play Store for a specific Android Device Configuration

Tools / Misc Tools

  • Internal Blue (‚≠ê738) - Bluetooth experimentation framework based on the Reverse Engineering of Broadcom Bluetooth Controllers
  • ARMv7 payload that provides arbitrary code execution on MediaTek bootloaders (‚≠ê88)

items.title: Awesome Agi Cocosci
items.content_text:
### Problem Solving / Planning

*   [From Skills to Symbols: Learning Symbolic Representations for Abstract High-Level Planning](https://jair.org/index.php/jair/article/view/11175) - ***Journal of Artificial Intelligence Research***, 2018. \[[All Versions](https://scholar.google.com/scholar?cluster=17962480659445514879)]. This work considers the problem of constructing abstract representations for planning in high-dimensional, continuous environments. The authors assume an agent equipped with a collection of high-level actions, and construct representations provably capable of evaluating plans composed of sequences of those actions. The authors first consider the deterministic planning case, and show that the relevant computation involves set operations performed over sets of states. The authors then consider probabilistic planning, which they show requires generalizing from sets of states to distributions over states. Finally, the authors apply these techniques to create a physical robot system that autonomously learns its own symbolic representation of a mobile manipulation task directly from sensorimotor data---point clouds, map locations, and joint angles---and then plans using that representation.
items.content_html:
Problem Solving / Planning

  • From Skills to Symbols: Learning Symbolic Representations for Abstract High-Level Planning - Journal of Artificial Intelligence Research, 2018. [All Versions]. This work considers the problem of constructing abstract representations for planning in high-dimensional, continuous environments. The authors assume an agent equipped with a collection of high-level actions, and construct representations provably capable of evaluating plans composed of sequences of those actions. The authors first consider the deterministic planning case, and show that the relevant computation involves set operations performed over sets of states. The authors then consider probabilistic planning, which they show requires generalizing from sets of states to distributions over states. Finally, the authors apply these techniques to create a physical robot system that autonomously learns its own symbolic representation of a mobile manipulation task directly from sensorimotor data---point clouds, map locations, and joint angles---and then plans using that representation.
